oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dual layer Pt metal nanocrystal flash for multi-level-cell NAND application
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, PK
BISHT, G
MAHAPATRA, S
HOFMANN, R
SINGH, K
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: memory
metal nanocrystal
non-volatile memory
nand
multi level cell
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Most of the current high-density Flash cells use multi-level-cell (MLC) technology to store 2-bits/cell to increase memory density. In this work, dual layer metal nanocrystal (NC) flash EEPROM device, with large memory window, good retention and 10(4) cycle endurance is reported. High-temperature retention, gate bias accelerated retention, read disturb and post-cycling retention measurements show excellent reliability of the NC devices which make them suitable for the MLC application.
